topic.title: Privacy Tools - Encryption against global mass surveillance

16_19sggoAZ4hcorrrfWoFWP9rwfpVsL29cnZ.body: Would it be difficult to create a bot (or a script) for automatically adding the new magnet links of clearnet sites (as  https://eztv.ag/) to http://127.0.0.1:43110/ZeroTorrent.bit/ every day?

1_1BNmjz9tBLY3M1tq2z7DKvA1LjFXYsmLd9.body:
> [darkalama](#comment_1_1NibKcCcidCHue94Rhr7F4Gvu3Lg6FAESp): I will add more pic to this web site .Please seed this site .Thanks

Please, instead of starting a new thread for every picture you upload. 
Try to add the pictures that are related to each other in one thread.  

Thank you!
